short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring holiday cheer to your screen with Christmas Tree Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring a beautifully decorated tree glowing with festive lights, this extension fills your new tab with the warmth and magic of Christmas. Access your favorite websites with shortcuts, add custom links, and stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default engine.

🎄 Live Wallpaper: Enjoy a stunning Christmas tree with twinkling lights and ornaments.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access frequently visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links of your choice.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of dates and time during the festive season.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Conduct searches easily with your preferred search engine.
Discover more festive extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
